body:
Comment 3 by **akalin**: 
Sorry, forgot to specify OS X version. I'm running 10.8.3.

Also forgot to put the output after the SIGQUIT.  Here's an example one:

SIGQUIT: quit
PC=0x229fb


goroutine 1 [chan receive]:
main.main()
        /Users/akalin/src/aks/aks_debug.go:46 +0x141

+0x1c
